summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, is coordinating the meeting and discussing changes in the schedule with her team.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
